Pokémon Alerts notify you when a selected Pokémon is nearby in the wild via in-game notification and push notifications. Push notifications occur less often.
Used to fuse Kyurem and Zekrom into Black Kyurem. It can be found when defeating Black Kyurem in Raids.
Used to fuse Necrozma and Lunala into Dawn Wings Necrozma. It can be found when defeating Dawn Wings Necrozma in Raids.
Used to fuse Necrozma and Solgaleo into Dusk Mane Necrozma. It can be found when defeating Dusk Mane Necrozma in Raids.
Used to fuse Kyurem and Reshiram into White Kyurem. It can be found when defeating White Kyurem in Raids.
굴레를 벗어난 후파 레이드 데이 티켓
설날 이벤트 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치 티켓
바람에 띄우는 마음 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치 티켓
하루에 열 수 있는 선물 10개 추가
We’ve found it at last! Kyurem, the Boundary Pokémon, is almost definitely the cause of the ongoing anomalies we’ve been observing.
This Legendary Pokémon is missing parts from its body. That may be why it has to stabilize by freezing itself!
Its genes are similar to two other Legendary Pokémon, Reshiram and Zekrom—and my readings indicate it’s seeking them out as we speak.
Let’s keep our eyes on the situation, %PLAYERNAME%. Things could spiral out of control if these powerful Pokémon meet.
So, Kyurem is able to fuse with either the Vast White Pokémon, Reshiram, or the Deep Black Pokémon, Zekrom.
In doing so, it absorbs the other Pokémon to become White Kyurem or Black Kyurem, respectively.
That said, we don’t know which of the two Kyurem will go for, and we can only focus on one at a time.
Which means that whether we track down Reshiram or Zekrom first, we’re giving Kyurem a chance to find the other.
So, would you rather deal with Reshiram and Black Kyurem, or Zekrom and White Kyurem?

I’ve heard that Reshiram can shift the atmosphere with heat energy by flaring its tail. And according to myth, when the people of the past became consumed with greed, Reshiram would burn down their kingdoms.
Intense stuff. And supposedly, it wants to help anyone wishing to build a world of truth.
What would you say your “truth” is, %PLAYERNAME%?
Might be a good idea to get your answer straight before you seek out Reshiram. Don’t get scorched!
Zekrom’s tail contains a giant electrical generator. When the interior part of the tail spins like a motor, it creates lightning it can use to blast its surroundings.
And in the past, when people lost sight of the righteousness in their hearts, Zekrom would raze their kingdoms with bolts of lightning.
Intense stuff. And supposedly, Zekrom also assists those who wish to build an ideal world. What does your ideal world look like, %PLAYERNAME%?
Mine has a comprehensive Pokémon database that lists their habitats and distribution across the world! Get yourself a dream like that, and Zekrom won’t have to zap you!
Supposedly, Reshiram and Zekrom were once a single Pokémon.
They say that it split apart during some kind of conflict in ancient times.
I haven’t turned up much on Kyurem’s origins, though—just hearsay from other researchers.
I do love a good mystery! Anyhow, all three of these powerful Pokémon seem to have a deep connection with Unova.
Perhaps we can get a better understanding of them by studying other Pokémon first discovered in the region.
Lots of Trainers from Unova pick Oshawott as their first partner Pokémon.
Oshawott fights by using the scalchop on its stomach like a knife, blocking attacks and then quickly retaliating.
They keep honing their skills as they evolve. They seem like a dedicated bunch!
There’s always something new we can learn from Pokémon, even if we have hundreds of battles under our belts. Take good care of Oshawott and see what it has to teach you!
Lots of Trainers from Unova pick Snivy as their first partner Pokémon.
You see its short arms? It’s quite good at using its vines to compensate!
They’re known to be intelligent and calm, but they become plenty swift when they’re charged up with sunlight.
There’s always something new we can learn from Pokémon, even if we have hundreds of battles under our belts. Take good care of Snivy and see what it has to teach you!
Lots of Trainers from Unova pick Tepig as their first partner Pokémon.
Just don’t underestimate how quick they are! If you don’t watch your lunch carefully, Tepig will be eating it before you can blink!
The ravenous little glutton also has a great sense of smell that helps it find food in the wild, which it then crisps up to eat, lickety-split!
There’s always something new we can learn from Pokémon, even if we have hundreds of battles under our belts. Take good care of Tepig and see what it has to teach you!
Good news—we’ve found Reshiram! The less good news is that Kyurem’s attention is now focused on Zekrom. Are you ready for what’s next?
Once Zekrom and Kyurem have calmed down, we can use DNA Splicers to help them fuse into Black Kyurem. But don't you worry about those technical matters!
From what I understand, Kyurem yearns to be whole, and as Black Kyurem, it would battle to protect an ideal world that will exist in the future for people and Pokémon.
A Pokémon with such dedication deserves a chance to fight for that future. Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%.
Good news—we’ve found Zekrom! The less good news is that Kyurem’s attention is now focused on Reshiram. Are you ready for what’s next?
Once Reshiram and Kyurem have calmed down, we can use DNA Splicers to help them fuse into White Kyurem. But don't you worry about those technical matters!
From what I understand, Kyurem yearns to be whole, and as White Kyurem, it would strive to protect the world of truth it has foreseen for people and Pokémon alike.
A Pokémon with such dedication deserves a chance to fight for that future. Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%.
This is incredible... I’ve read about Absofusion, but I never dared to dream I’d witness it firsthand!
What about you? Did you ever think you'd see something so amazing?
People are so passionate about their dreams. I used to wonder if our differences were irreconcilable, but this has shown me that we all complement each other when we’re united.
I don’t know if I’ll be around long enough to see the future Kyurem awaits, but I’m excited to work with you to make it a reality!
Good, you’re here! I have news about Kyurem, the Dragon- and Ice-type Legendary Pokémon!
Supposedly, it uses its powers over ice to freeze its body to stabilize its cellular structure.
Just thinking about that sends a chill down my spine!
And on that note, let’s do some warm-ups. Gotta stay limber for a big day of exploring, right?
Rumor has it that Kyurem dwells in the Unova region.
Unova is an extraordinary place! It has bustling modern metropolises, but there are also tranquil forests whose inhabitants live in harmony with nature.
And since we’re going to unravel a Unova mystery, it’s only fitting that we get help from Pokémon first discovered there.
Which of these first partner Pokémon would you like to join you on this adventure?
Here’s a fun fact about Oshawott: the shell it has is called a “scalchop.”
They use their scalchop not only as a blade in battle, but also as a tool to break open hard Berries.
They’ll even sharpen them on riverbed stones, something apparently learned by mimicking humans using whetstones.
In other words, Oshawott need to take good care of their scalchops in order to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Snivy prefers to avoid groups, so it’s a great match for Trainers who tend to be more independent.
The leaf on its tail generates energy when exposed to sunlight. When it’s not feeling well, the tail will start to droop.
On the other hand—or vine—Snivy that get enough light become swift and dexterous!
In other words, Snivy need alone time and ample sunlight to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Make sure you have lots of Berries on hand if you’re going adventuring with Tepig!
They use their excellent sense of smell to find food, and then they cook it up nice and crispy before they eat it!
It can launch fireballs from its nose, but don’t expect more than pitch-black smoke if it gets sick.
In any case, Tepig need snacks aplenty to thrive.
I’d bet Kyurem has some particular needs of its own. While you train your new partner, I’ll study Kyurem to see what they might be.
Hi there, %PLAYERNAME%. So, given what I can glean from my research, Kyurem seems to be looking for something.
From what I’ve read, it’s waiting for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with either truth or ideals.
Heady stuff, eh? While you’re certainly a hero in my book, I don’t know what to do with the rest of it.
For now, the best we can do is try and keep Kyurem busy. Battle it with everything you’ve got, and I’m sure you’ll succeed!
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Oshawott looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
And while this probably won’t be the last we see of Kyurem, you averted a real disaster by defeating it. For now, enjoy your adventures, %PLAYERNAME%!
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Snivy looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
And while this probably won’t be the last we see of Kyurem, you averted a real disaster by defeating it. For now, enjoy your adventures, %PLAYERNAME%!
Now that was an inspiring battle! Just goes to show that when people and Pokémon work together, we can overcome any differences and achieve our biggest dreams!
Tepig looks like it learned a lot from you, too. In fact, I think it’s ready to evolve!
And while this probably won’t be the last we see of Kyurem, you averted a real disaster by defeating it. For now, enjoy your adventures, %PLAYERNAME%!
Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Funny you should pop by—I was just reflecting on our incredible journey together!
Encountering gigantic Pokémon, unfurling incredible mysteries, foiling Team GO Rocket countless times... We’ve faced extraordinary challenges together, haven’t we?
Our research has introduced us to Pokémon from all over the world, forged wonderful friendships, and led to some amazing discoveries.
And speaking of discoveries, I’ve noticed some unusual sounds lately.
I’m going to investigate, and while I do, I need you to continue your excellent work in the field.
Good news, %PLAYERNAME%! I’ve made a breakthrough on those acoustic mysteries I was looking into.
And as I suspected, they’re not just any sound wave, they’re the unique melodies of the Mythical Pokémon Meloetta!
Meloetta uses song to influence the emotions of those who hear it. And on that note, I’d like you to try and spot any unusual behavior in the local Pokémon.
It’s not every day we get to study a Mythical Pokémon, so let’s make the most of this opportunity!
Hello again, %PLAYERNAME%! We may not have found Meloetta yet, but I can definitely still hear it.
So our musical friend can’t be too far off—we just might have to change our usual pitch.
Why don’t you go out and do a little singing and dancing to see if it affects people and Pokémon nearby?
Who knows, that might be the "key" to success! Heh heh... Music joke. I’ve got a million!
If it isn’t our intrepid enter-Trainer! Say, did you know that Meloetta’s melodies have inspired many famous songs?
It’s just fascinating—Meloetta shows us how music helps us to forge special bonds with one another.
It’s not unlike your amazing ability to connect with other people and Pokémon. Every new Pokémon you catch or Trainer you meet is a new potential friend!
And on that uplifting note, get out there and see what new friendships await, %PLAYERNAME%.
%PLAYERNAME%! I’ve dug up some useful information on Meloetta. Did you know that it was first discovered in the Unova region?
That might not seem critical, but we have to take advantage of every scrap of information we can to help us make sense of Meloetta’s behavior.
Keep up your fieldwork, if you would! Watch for Pokémon experiencing strong emotions, check out some new places, and maybe try to forge some new connections.
Let’s keep this research rhythm going!
This is the moment we’ve been waiting for, %PLAYERNAME%!
Your dedicated work has helped me to pinpoint Meloetta’s location at last!
This could be your chance to befriend an extraordinary Pokémon.
Head out there and show Meloetta the same kindness and dedication you’ve shown all your Pokémon friends!
What a striking appearance this Meloetta has! My research notes have nothing about this distinctive coloring. It’s truly incredible!
I’ve been watching your journey since you took your first steps as a Trainer. Seeing how far you’ve come makes me so proud to call you my research partner—and more importantly, my friend!
I know you’ll keep that Meloetta singing proudly, %PLAYERNAME%. You never fall flat!
Hi there, %PLAYERNAME%! Which of these Pokémon would you like to join you on your adventure?
Pokémon GO Tour: 하나지방 -  글로벌에 어서 오세요!
Pokémon GO Tour: 하나지방 -  Los Angeles에 어서 오세요!
Pokémon GO Tour: 하나지방 -  New Taipei City에 어서 오세요!
랭크마다 추가 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다.
랭크마다 받을 수 있는 추가 리워드에 덧붙여 10랭크 상승과 이벤트 스티커를 받을 수 있습니다.
디럭스 코스를 선택하면 프리미엄 리워드를 받고 비크티니와 바로 만날 수 있습니다!
Pokémon Presents 2025 x GO Tour: 하나지방 시간제한 리서치
Pokémon Presents 2025 x GO Tour: 하나지방 시간제한 리서치(1/1)
랭크가 올라가면 리워드가 잠금 해제 됩니다. 이벤트 중 플레이하지 않으면 리워드는 받을 수 없습니다.

투어패스 디럭스를 구매하면 다음 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다!
- 비크티니와의 만남
- 반짝반짝 프렌드가 될 수 있는 도구 반짝이 참
- 큐레무 합체 에너지
- 기타
콜드플레어는 타겟 링의 속도를 떨어뜨리기 때문에 던지는 볼의 정밀도가 높아집니다.
격한 냉기가 {0}분동안 방출되어 타겟 링의 속도가 떨어진다
Weather conditions may be affecting Pokémon Playgrounds.
현지시간 20025년 2월 20일 20시까지 바람에 띄우는 마음 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치를 진행할 수 있는 티켓.
이 티켓은 자동으로 활성화되어 현지시간 2월 18일에 바람에 띄우는 마음 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치가 진행됩니다.
현지시간 2025년 2월 2일 20시까지 설날 이벤트 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치를 진행할 수 있는 티켓.
이 티켓은 자동으로 활성화되어 현지시간 1월 29일에 설날 이벤트 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치가 진행됩니다.
이 티켓은 자동으로 활성화되어 현지시간 1월 21일에 강철의 결심 프리미엄 시간제한 리서치가 진행됩니다.

This ticket will automatically activate to give you access to Masterwork Research: A Dazzling Aria from Monday, February 24, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, March 2, 2025, at 6:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are.

이 티켓은 자동으로 활성화되어 현지시간 2025년 2월 15일에 발생하는 보너스를 손에 넣을 수 있습니다.
현지시간 2025년 2월 9일 14시부터 쪼마리와 딱정곤 커뮤니티 데이 스페셜리서치를 진행하기 위한 티켓.

This ticket will automatically activate to give you access to special bonuses starting February 24, wherever you are.

Are you sure you want to pause?
The sameness of Reshiram’s and Kyurem’s genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Reshiram. Kyurem can now use the power of both fire and ice.
It’s said that this Pokémon battles in order to protect the ideal world that will exist in the future for people and Pokémon.

커뮤니티 데이 스페셜 배경 시간제한 리서치

이것을 선택하면 블랙(레시라무) 버전 메달을 받을 수 있으며 레시라무 관련 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.

'GO Tour: 하나지방 - 글로벌'의 블랙큐레무 레이드배틀에서 잡은 큐레무는 얼어붙은세계를 배웁니다.

또한, 투어패스 사용으로 프리즈볼트 효과 지속시간을 연장할 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 스페셜 배경이 있는 수댕이와 2회 만날 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 수댕이와 많이 만날 수 있으며 수댕이가 향로에 반응할 가능성이 올라갑니다.
이것을 선택하면 수댕이와 많이 만날 수 있으며 스페셜리서치에서 수댕이 관련 추가 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 스페셜 배경이 있는 주리비얀과 2회 만날 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 주리비얀과 많이 만날 수 있으며 주리비얀이 향로에 반응할 가능성이 올라갑니다.
이것을 선택하면 주리비얀과 많이 만날 수 있으며 스페셜리서치에서 주리비얀 관련 추가 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 스페셜 배경이 있는 뚜꾸리와 2회 만날 수 있습니다.
이것을 선택하면 뚜꾸리와 많이 만날 수 있으며 뚜꾸리가 향로에 반응할 가능성이 올라갑니다.
이것을 선택하면 뚜꾸리와 많이 만날 수 있으며 스페셜리서치에서 뚜꾸리 관련 추가 리워드를 받을 수 있습니다.

이것을 선택하면 화이트(레시라무) 버전 메달을 받을 수 있으며 제크로무 관련 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.

'GO Tour: 하나지방 - 글로벌'의 화이트큐레무 레이드배틀에서 잡은 큐레무는 얼어붙은세계를 배웁니다.

또한, 투어패스 사용으로 콜드플레어 효과 지속시간을 연장할 수 있습니다.
Give your buddy a treat on {0} different days
이 세상의자연, 그리고 인간계에 있는 이중성... 거기서 볼 수 있는 두드러진 대조.
최근 본 것으로 특별히 흥미로웠던 것이 있어.
그건, 블랑쉬와 클리프 두 사람이 배틀에 관심을 두었다는 것. 그러면서 한쪽은 방어 전략을 나머지 한쪽은 궁극적인 힘을 추구했지.
좀 더 생각해보고 싶어. 윌로우박사의 의견도 들어보고 싶네.
%PLAYERNAME%, 배틀에 관해서는 당신쪽이 경험이 풍부하지. 그러니까 알려주면 좋겠어. 포켓몬 트레이너가 목표로 하는 것은 균형잡힌 접근이라는 말에 동의해?
응, 그렇구나. 그럼 그게 이번 일을 해결하는 열쇠가 되겠지.
모든 것은 2가지 면을 가지고 있고 한쪽만 봐도 좋은 결과를 얻을 수 없다는, 그런 거구나.
앞으로의 일을 생각하면... 조금 더 기다리면 박사가 칸델라와 GO로켓단 리더 중 하나에 대한 정보를 알려 줄 거야.
그럼 박사의 연락이 있을 때까지 잘 지내. 뭐라고 하더라... "나중에 뵙겠습니다".
칸델라는 협력의 의의를 말한 데 비해, 알로는 완전 반대였어. 하지만 마지막에는 아주 조금이지만 서로 가까워진 것 같군.
사람과의 유대가 힘을 내는 자. 자신의 생각대로 세계를 만들려고 하는 자.
모두 훌륭해. 뭔가 배움이 있었다면 이 2가지 생각 사이에도 균형이 있다는 것이지.
이중성, 균형, 힘, 이상... 철학에도 관심이 있다보니 생각을 시작하면 멈출 수 없어!
내 나름대로 정리해서 어떤 이론을 도출했어.
하지만 여기에서 말하지는 않을게. 동료와의 협력이라는 의미에 대해 다른 연구자의 의견도 들어보고 싶군.
뭔가 알게된다면 연락줘, %PLAYERNAME%. 곧 결론을 낼 수 있을 거야.
%PLAYERNAME%, 믿을 수 있는 친구의 존재란 좋은 거야, 그렇지?  나날이 실감하고 있니, %PLAYERNAME%?
동료라고 하면 칸델라가 트레이너와 포켓몬을 신경쓰고 있더라고. 동료 협력으로 용기 백배! 같은 사람이니까!
정 반대가 알로지. 그 행동은 자기 중심적이지. GO로켓단 동료도 그가 뭘 하는지 잘 몰라.
정 반대인 두 사람을 관찰하면 뭔가 보이는 게 있을 거다. 어느 쪽 리더로 할래?
무슨 볼일이죠? 내 귀중한 시간을 낭비하게 하지 말라고요.
간단한 지시도 이해를 못하는 조무래기뿐이라 곤란한데 이번에는 이건가.
너같은 범인에게는 내가 하려고 하는 일을 이해할 수 없을겁니다.
자, 이게 처음이자 마지막 경고다. 즉시 사라져라.
너와 윌로우박사, 리, 그리고 스파크와 블랑쉬 모두 있어서 다행이야.
물론 포니타의 존재도! 포니타 덕분에 트레이너로서 열정을 불태울 수 있어.
최근 느끼는 이 불온한 공기말이야.... 나는 괜찮은데... 내가 사랑하는 사람들과 포켓몬이 걱정이야.
뭔가 일어난다면 모두 힘을 합쳐서 해결하자.
쳇, 겨우 해방이군. 조무래기 상대는 즐거웠나?
하, 평소에 번번이 방해받지 않는 데에 그들은 쓸모가 있었나 보군요.
벌레처럼 보이지만 등에 핀 버섯이 의지를 가지고 있답니다. 즉, 조무래기가 몸통이고 내가 바로 의지를 가진 버섯인 셈이지.
버섯이 누구인지를 잊지 않는다면야 벌레가 수마리 움직여도 그건 그거대로 좋습니다.
조사하면서 알게 된 게 있어. 야생 포켓몬은 협력 관계인 경우가 있어.
그건 신뢰 관계가 아니라 서로 자립한 관계성이야.
촛불로 다른 초를 켜는 것과 비슷해. 불꽃을 나눠도 그 빛에 변함은 없어.
만약 혼자라고 해도 동료가 곁에 있어도, 무슨 일이 생겨도 잘 해낼 수 있는 기분이 들어.
너한테도 자신 있게 말할 수 있어, %PLAYERNAME%! 다양한 도전을 헤쳐왔지만... 내 도움이 필요하다면 언제든지 도와줄 테니 말해줘.
공격과 방어라는 서로 반대이면서 보완이 되는 요소. 이것을 살펴 보면 알게 되는 게 있을 거야.

Congratulations! You completed this stamp rally!
A stamp rally is an activity where you collect stamps at various PokéStops and Gyms.
If you visit target PokéStops and Gyms, a stamp sheet will automatically appear. Interact with it to receive a stamp.

Some stamp rallies allow you to collect stamps together with friends, even if you can't visit the PokéStop yourself. If your friend who is at a level of {0} or higher sends you a gift from that PokéStop, it will also progress your collection!
Some stamp rallies offer items or other rewards for collecting stamps. Collect lots of stamps and encounter many great things!

This gift includes a stamp for a Stamp Rally. Your friend will also receive a gift with a Stamp Rally stamp, allowing them to collect it remotely.

Stamp markers will be displayed above the PokéStops included in the stamp rally.
When you tap on these PokéStops, the stamp sheet will automatically appear.

If there is progress in the stamp rally, the stamp button will be displayed in the menu on the right side of the map until the date changes. By pressing this button, you can easily check the progress of that stamp rally.
